resources.string: Kizuna Audio Controller

Theme Switcher
Audio Controller
UHQA (Ultra High Quality Audio)
UHQA mode allows to have high performance audio when using headset at primary.
Turn off/on UHQA to switch the amplifier for HPH path.
Details
Ultra High Quality Audio is active
Ultra High Quality Audio is not active
UHQA (Ultra High Quality Audio) is not available
Headset High Performance Mode
Invoke class AB mode for headset path when sample rate is set to 192KHz and bit depth is set to 24.
Enable it to set headset path in UHQA mode.
Headset High Performance Mode is active
Headset High Performance Mode is not active
Headset High Performance feature is not available
Low Distortion AMP
Provide low distortion audio quality by enable/disable AB Class Mode directly on amplifier.
Enable it to configure low distortion mode.
>Low Distortion AMP is active
Low Distortion AMP is not active
Low Distortion AMP feature is not available
Headphone Impedance Detection
Provide impedance of headphones to be able to adjust gain according to impedance
so user can have consistent volume level with different headphones.
>Headphone Impedance Detection is active
Headphone Impedance Detection is not active
Headphone Impedance Detection feature is not available
Current State :
Support
Not Supported
Enable
Disable
